content: 31 35 39 43 45 49 sts beg with row 1 work 2 row in rib as set on front slip centre 11 13 15 17 17 19 sts onto a stitch holder for neckband next row rib 4 cast off 2 sts rib to end rejoin yarn to rem 20 22 24 26 28 30 sts and k to end next row rib to last 4 sts cast on 2 sts rib 4 next row ws p to last 4 sts p2togtbl p2 work 3 row in rib neck edge 19 21 23 25 27 29 sts cast off in rib next row k2 sl1 k1 psso k to end 18 20 22 24 26 28 sts next row p to last 4 sts p2togtbl p2 17 19 21 23 25 27 sts making up next row k to end next row p4 2 3 4 2 3 m1 p3 m1 3 5 5 5 7 7 times p4 2 3 4 2 3 placing front shoulder edging over back shoulder edging and sew 21 25 27 29 33 35 sts in position at side edge insert sleeves by folding each sleeve in half lengthwise and place the fold to shoulder seam sew in position between markers join side and sleeve seams sew on buttons shoulder edging weave in ends and pin your garment out to the size stated in the change to 3 25mm needles knit 2 row pattern cover with a damp cloth and leave to dry next row rs *p1 k1 repeat from * to last st p1 next row k1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end these 2 row set rib and are repeated work 6 row more cast off in rib sleeves both alike using 3 25mm needles cast on 37 37 39 41 41 45 sts and work 7 7 9 9 11 11 row in rib as set on front next row p7 7 8 7 7 9 p2tog p5 5 5 6 6 6 p2tog 3 times p7 7 8 8 8 10 33 33 35 37 37 41 sts change to 4mm needles and beg with a k row cont in st-st throughout work 2 2 2 6 6 2 row without shaping next row rs kfb k to last 2 sts kfb k1 35 35 37 39 39 43 sts work 5 3 3 3 3 5 row without shaping in st st repeat last 6 4 4 4 4 6 row 2 5 6 7 9 9 times more 39 45 49 53 57 61 sts cont without shaping until sleeve measures 12 15 17 20 24 29 cm from cast on edge ending with rs facing for next row 6 design west yorkshire spinners technical editors helen birch faye perriam-reed and copyright chloé elizabeth birch the design in this pattern is copyrighted and must not be
